title: # 302 - Tom Rhodes & ME
description:
I sit down with comedian Tom Rhodes and we talk about traveling, planning my next trip, Tom's tea story, Tom's near death experience, and much more! 

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron. Get your first 3 meals free at www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

This episode is brought to you by Omaha Steaks. Go to www.omahasteaks.com and type “Bert” in the search bar and add the "Family Gourmet Buffett Package" to your cart for only $49.99.

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
